Title: Relates to schedule in case of disability
Summary: Relates to schedule in case of disability; provides the compensation shall not be less than one-fifth of the New York state average weekly wage unless the employee's weekly wage is equal to or less than one-fifth the weekly wage, then they shall receive the entire amount.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to schedule in case of disability
